        public UIHudCheckBoxElement​(int x,
                            int y,
                            int sideLength)
        Creates a new check box element in the given position and with the given side length (meant to be a square).
        Parameters:
        x - the horizontal position of this element
        y - the vertical position of this element
        sideLength - the size of the element's sides
        Since:
        1.1.0

      • UIHudCheckBoxElement

        public UIHudCheckBoxElement​(int x,
                            int y,
                            int sideLength,
                            java.lang.String text)
        Creates a new check box element in the given position and with the given side length (meant to be a square). Also sets the text to be displayed on the side of this checkbox.
        Parameters:
        x - the horizontal position of this element
        y - the vertical position of this element
        sideLength - the size of the element's sides
        text - the text to be displayed
        Since:
        1.1.0
